name: Shibani
description:
Nagato, a fearless Shiba-Inu Ninja of the revered Otogama Clan, sets out on a mission to rescue his closest comrade, Cato, who has fallen under the control of a malicious force. The deranged Doctor Cato now terrorizes the world with his lunatic scientific exploits, but Nagato is determined to restore his friend's good nature, no matter what challenges he must face.

Team

Kenneth Driesch - Game Design/ 2D Art - LinkedIn

Mikel Weber - Programming - LinkedIn

Extern

Sebastian Gsänger - Programming Support

Installation

1. Download the .zip
2. Unpack the folder
3. Start the .exe
4. Enjoy the game!
